title: koko_smoko
author: koko_smoko
content: Hello guys,Been searching for prominent trading events, where the effort is worth it. Some platforms used to organise them regularly in the past.I’m not speaking about faucets or lottery where the rewards are too small and there is no certainty of winning. I am rather on the hunt for events where I can trade a lot and get rewarded for that, based on my ranking on the leader board or my trading volume or something similar. And if the rewards are in Bitcoin and not some scammy small cap, this could be a good investment of my time during the bear market. Any recommendations, based on actual experience?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Just go to every exchange as most of the time each of them has its own trading events. For the list of them, check each of those exchanges that are listed on coinmarketcap or any other the same website.(https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/)Well, you have to check them manually and see what trading events they offer individually.

comments.author: Killredillla
comments.body: Binance frequently hosts many trading events. The latest of which was this: https://www.binance.com/en/market-activity/305a45fc48c448bd885ed4a7178fe9d4 You can earn a portion of the prizepool by completing simple tasks such as using Binance earn,P2P, etc.If you want, you can open a Binance account so you will get notified when a contest starts.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Most of trading events only had on new exchanges since they're still looking for new customers, while the old and popular exchanges are rarely had this events. Of course using a new exchanges are risky enough, you may get asked to submit the whole KYC in order to prevent you're a bot or abusing their events. I hope you're care with your privacy and not only looking to get few bucks but you're need to sacrifice your identity.
